I think you might enjoy "Tora! Tora! Tora!" from 1970, which is a gripping and historically accurate portrayal of the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor. The film features an all-star cast, including James Whitmore, Martin Balsam, and Joseph Cotten, and its thrilling action sequences will keep you on the edge of your seat.

If you're looking for something a bit more lighthearted, "Monsters University" from 2013 is a hilarious and heartwarming prequel to the popular "Monsters, Inc." franchise. The film follows the misadventures of Mike Wazowski and James P. "Sully" Sullivan as they navigate college life and learn valuable lessons about friendship and perseverance.
